description: Git tools: git_status and git_diff (read-only, no commits)

steps.description: Context command â€” no LLM call needed

steps.userQuery: show me the current git status
steps.description: Coder uses git_status to show working tree status

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll check the git status for you.

<tool_call>
{"name": "git_status", "args": {}}
</tool_call>

steps.userQuery: what changed since the last commit?
steps.description: Coder uses git_diff to show unstaged changes

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll show you the unstaged changes.

<tool_call>
{"name": "git_diff", "args": {"staged": false}}
</tool_call>

steps.userQuery: show me what is staged for commit

agentResponses.responseFallback:
I'll show you the staged changes.

<tool_call>
{"name": "git_diff", "args": {"staged": true}}
</tool_call>
